Talk14:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>That's it for my explanation!<sp:5:0:0> Was there
anything else you didn't understand?
Talk16:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Yeah, see you! Talk to me anytime you
need something—or even just because!
Talk17:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>The thunder's rumbling, so be careful
about <clr:0000>what you've got equipped<clr:ffff>!
Talk18:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>Ah, it's you, mister!<sp:5:0:0> Hello!<sp:5:0:0> Welcome to
<clr:0000>Tabantha Bridge Stable<clr:ffff>!
Talk19:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>Ah, it's you, mister!<sp:5:0:0> Good evening!<sp:5:0:0>
Welcome to <clr:0000>Tabantha Bridge Stable<clr:ffff>!
Talk20:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Whoa! Mister, you're soaking wet.<sp:5:0:0> Were
you walking in the rain?<sp:5:0:0> You should rest
and dry off inside.
Talk21:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>So, did you come talk to me because...<sp:5:0:0>
you wanted to ask about the stable?
Talk09_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>If you're curious about what's around
us, talk to my mom outside the stable.
LargeHorse: Will that fit in the stable?
Talk23:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Humming><sp:0:2:2:6400>♪If you treat your horse <sp:5:0:0>with love and
affection, <sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:5:1:0>they'll get tamer and tamer,<sp:5:0:0>
and follow directions!♪<sp:5:0:0>
I bet you haven't heard that song before,
huh?<sp:5:0:0> That's because I made it up!
Talk24:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Humming>♪If you love your horse every day,<sp:5:0:0> they'll
listen to what you have to say!♪
Talk25:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Humming><sp:0:2:2:6400>♪If you've got lots of unused stuff,<sp:5:0:0>
materials and more, <sp:5:0:0>don't waste another
second, <sp:5:0:0>just sell 'em at the store!♪
<sp:3:0:2:0000>You haven't heard that song anywhere
else, right?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>That's because I made it up! I based it on
something a guest told me one time.
Talk26:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Humming>♪Before unused materials start to smell,<sp:5:0:0>
get to the store and sell, sell, sell!♪<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>If you want to sell your extra stuff, the
guy with the beetle backpack is always
buying things.
<snd:LaughS_01>That's what another visitor told me,
at least!
Talk27:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm so glad you made it to our stable.<sp:5:0:0>
You should take a nice, long rest here!
Talk28:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>If your body hurts,<sp:5:0:0> <clr:0000>rest in a bed<clr:ffff> and
you'll feel all better!
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>Ah...<sp:5:0:0> Good evening!<sp:5:1:0> Er, no. Good day!
Yeah, that's what I meant!
Talk22_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Sad>This rain just won't stop...<sp:5:0:0> Oh, did you
wanna chat, mister?
Talk30:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>Are you here to see the <clr:0000>Stable Trotters<clr:ffff>'
performance too?

Or did you come to ask me about
the stable?
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>Ah...<sp:5:0:0> Good day!<sp:5:1:0> Er, no. Good evening!
Yeah, that's right!
Talk31:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You didn't know?<sp:5:0:0> Those people over there
are the Stable Association-recognized
<clr:0000>Stable Trotters<clr:ffff> musical troupe!
Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>W...<sp:5:0:0>wel...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800>Welcome to our stable!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0101>Ahaha!<sp:5:0:0> Sorry, I'm nervous! You're
our first new customer in a while!
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>You're a traveler, aren't you, mister!<sp:5:0:0>
This stable is so far to the west that
we don't get many new customers!
Talk05:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think_01>Even less now... <sp:5:0:0>There's this <clr:0000>really bad
snowstorm<clr:ffff> in the Hebra region next to
us, so nobody's showing up.
Talk34:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Those people over there...<sp:5:0:0> ♪They're the
Stable Association-recognized <clr:0000>Stable
Trotters <clr:ffff>musical trouuupe!♪
Talk06:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>So? <sp:5:0:0>Did you come talk to me because you
wanted to ask about the stable?
Talk35:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>When the troupe leader and all four
musicians are gathered together, they
just make the happiest music!
Talk07:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>As I suspected!<sp:5:0:0> You just had this look
about you that said, "I hope someone
tells me all about this amazing place."<sp:5:0:0>
Well, allow me to give you an explanation
of <clr:0000>Tabantha Bridge Stable<clr:ffff>!<sp:5:0:0>
Talk36:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Even though we don't have many
customers, they always put on amazing
performances for us.
I wish I could let them perform for lots
and lots of people somehow!
Talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting>OK, so, if you want to rest here, go to the
counter inside the stable!
Talk37: <sp:3:0:2:0801>Is there anything else you want to ask?
Talk09:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Normally my mom would tell you all about
the area around us...

But she's under the tree talking to a Rito
lady right now, so I'll tell you instead!

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>If you head west from here, there's
<clr:0000>Rito Village<clr:ffff>!<sp:5:1:0> And if you head east,
there's <clr:0000>New Serenne Stable<clr:ffff>!
Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>If you're curious about what's around
us, talk to my mom inside the stable.
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>And if you wanna know about the stable's
facilities, just ask my big brother, Kenyo!
He's running laps right now.<sp:5:0:0>
Talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>And if you wanna know about the stable's
facilities, just ask my big brother, Kenyo!
He's working just nearby.<sp:5:0:0>
Talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>Oh, and also...<sp:5:0:0>I'd be happy if you talked
to my little brother, Sho, too!

I love getting to work with my family!
